00035 //          SERVER TO CLIENT
00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__SUNPRO_CC)
00037 #pragma pack(1)
00038 #endif
00039 struct Header_Struct{
00040     int8    eDonkeyID;
00041     int32   packetlength;
00042     int8    command;
00043 }
00044 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__SUNPRO_CC)
00045 ;
00046 #pragma pack()
00047 #else
00048 __attribute__((__packed__));
00049 #endif

00066 ;
00067 #pragma pack(1)
00068 #endif
00069 struct Requested_Block_Struct{
00070     uint64  StartOffset;
00071     uint64  EndOffset;
00072     uint32  packedsize;
00073     unsigned char   FileID[16];
00074     uint32  transferred; // Barry - This counts bytes completed
00075 }
00076 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__SUNPRO_CC)
00077 ;
00078 #pragma pack()
00079 #else
00080 __attribute__((__packed__));
00081 #endif

00083 struct Pending_Block_Struct{
00084     Requested_Block_Struct* block;
00085     struct z_stream_s*       zStream;       // Barry - Used to unzip packets
00086     uint32      totalUnzipped; // Barry - This holds the total unzipped bytes for all packets so far
00087     uint32      fZStreamError : 1,
00088                 fRecovered    : 1;  
00089 };

00117 //Kry import of 0.30d 
00118 // Maella -Enhanced Chunk Selection- (based on jicxicmic)
00119 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__SUNPRO_CC)
00120 #pragma pack(1)
00121 #endif
00122 struct Chunk {
00123     uint16 part;      // Index of the chunk
00124         union {
00125             uint16 frequency; // Availability of the chunk
00126             uint16 rank;      // Download priority factor (highest = 0, lowest = 0xffff)
00127     };
00128 }
00129 #if defined(_MSC_VER) || defined(__SUNPRO_CC)
00130 ;
00131 #pragma pack()
00132 #else
00133 __attribute__((__packed__));
00134 #endif
